nurse.name: Nurse
nurse.text: As you know, you are the 6th patient that has entered our care. We treat all our patients with the respect they deserve. And we provide an assortment of activities and food that is sure to keep everyone’s spirits up.

nurse.name: Nurse
nurse.text: The housing rules you can find by the door.  But for every resident, we also provide a customized to do list that we guarantee will help keep your body fit... and your mind healthy... More or less.

nurse.name: Nurse
nurse.text: You are free to wander the house unsupervised, however...

nurse.name: Nurse
nurse.text: Keep in mind that this housing is old, so if you run into trouble-

!0#N.name: !0#N
!0#N.text: Go on, it'll be good for you.

!0#N.name: !0#N
!0#N.text: Now both sides can't bother anyone.

!0#N.name: !0#N
!0#N.text: Well... Unless the walls are thin here too.

6!@$C#.name: 6!@$C#
6!@$C#.text: I heard there was a TV in your room MC.

nurse.name: Nurse
nurse.text: These are your fellow residents Owen, Sammy, Mark, and Barry.

nurse.name: Nurse
nurse.text: You should know them, they’re related to your past... One way or the other.

option: Can I go to my room?

ow3n.name: OW3N
ow3n.text: We were friernds in college. You remember?

ow3n.name: OW3N
ow3n.text: I like to look at the art exhibits. They remind me of my own works. Maybe you could visit them too?

option: I feel like I know you.

ma2k.name: MA2K
ma2k.text: You should. We’ve known each other for so long. Was I the first to know you here?

ma2k.name: MA2K
ma2k.text: No.. No I wasn’t. I know there was someone, but I haven’t seen their face in some time.

ma2k.name: MA2K
ma2k.text: I'll remember when I see them.

b4rry.name: B4RRY
b4rry.text: You can explore the home... Meet the residents. Hee-hee... sometimes they setup events for us to visit.

option: What do you like to do here?

5ammy.name: 5AMMY
5ammy.text: Yeah I'm fine, just a seasonal cough. You know... Body isn't what it used to be.

5ammy.name: 5AMMY
5ammy.text: I... I think so? Maybe when I was working as a _COUGH- _COUGH- _COUGH-

5ammy.name: 5AMMY
5ammy.text: Oh dinner room, you can find me at the dinner room sometimes. They serve really delicious food sometimes.

nurse.name: Nurse
nurse.text: The art exhibit is still under construction. Please do not endanger yourself.

nurse_pass.name: Nurse
nurse_pass.text: Seriously do not pass. Disobeying means breaking the housing rules.

nurse.name: Nurse
nurse.text: Don't mind me, I'm just preparing the dining table.

nurse.name: Nurse
nurse.text: You will be called when it is time to eat.

nurse.name: Nurse
nurse.text: I don't know what you mean. -Whistles-

nurse_grab.name: Nurse
nurse_grab.text: For your own safety, please refrain from disobeying the nurses.
